price: A zašto ne pogledaju nebo iznad sebe – kako smo ga sazdali i ukrasili i kako u njemu nema nereda!?
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَنظُرُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَيۡفَ بَنَيۡنَٰهَا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalam yanẓurū ilā al-samāi fawqahum kayfa banaynāhā wazayyannāhā wamā lahā min furūjin
